ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_CFG
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: TODO.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_VERSION
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Unusual 16-bit field.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_PHY_ID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Can be 0x5A5A_5A5A to indicate that this field is invalid; otherwise, it is set to the MII PHY ID value.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_ASF_STATUS_MBOX
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Sometimes set to BOOTCODE_READY_MAGIC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_FW_RESET_TYPE_MBOX
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: TODO

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_BC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set to 0xFEFE_0009 at S2 start. Possibly boot progress indicator. Upper 16 is always 0xFEFE, possible validity indicator. Observed lower16 values: 8 9 - Stage2 start

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_D8
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Field names are guessed.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_1DC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Unknown. Some information from

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_WOL_MBOX
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Register manual states "recommended value" is 0x474C_0000.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_CFG_HW
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set from NVM.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_CFG_SHARED
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set from NVM.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_FW_VERSION
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set from NVM 0x096; firmware version and upper 16 bits of manufacturing date.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_CPMU_STATUS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: The upper 16 bits of this is the upper 16 bits of

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_CFG_5
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set from NVM 0x21C.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_DBG_CONTROL_STATUS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Firmware Debug Control

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GEN_DBG_DATA
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Firmware Debug Data

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: MODE
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: More of these bits can be found in diagnostic utilities, but they don't seem too interesting.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Reset
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Used to reset the APE block.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Halt
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: APE is halted if set. Setting then unsetting this bit resets the APE to its reset vector, etc.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Fast Boot
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Can be used to boot from RAM instead of NVM. Takes a full APE image with section headers, etc. so you still need to form a proper image.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Event 1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Used to signal the APE that an event from the host is ready for processing in SHM.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LAN 0 Dstate
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates port is in D3 if set, otherwise the port is in D0-D2.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LAN 1 Dstate
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates port is in D3 if set, otherwise the port is in D0-D2.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GPIO_MESSAGE
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Related to APE fastboot. In that case the value of it is an APE memory address in the code region. If Fast Boot is set, and the low two bits of this are not 0b10, ROM hangs (you have to OR 0x2 into the address). Otherwise, they are masked off and the resulting value is used as the reset vector. The resulting value is also stored in this register (i.e., the low two bits are cleared).

ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Event 1

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RXBufOffset Func0
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This is examined on the APE Packet RX interrupt, and indicates the offset of an incoming (from-network) frame within the APE memory space, which provides access to the from-network RX buffer.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RXBufOffset Func1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This is examined on the APE Packet RX interrupt, and indicates the offset of an incoming (from-network) frame within the APE memory space, which provides access to the from-network RX buffer.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: MODE_2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Expansion for

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: LOCK_GRANT__OBSOLETE_
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: See

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: B0
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Unknown.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: GINT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: TODO: See diag for field info.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: CM3
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Seems CPU control related.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: SEG_SIG
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: APE_APE_MAGIC ('APE!') when all is well.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: unknown_31_28
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If this is all-ones, it appears to mean the APE FW is halted.

ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Unknown.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: SEG_MESSAGE_BUFFER_OFFSET
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Specifies the offset of a scratchpad area, relative to the start of the APE SHM area (i.e., relative to APE_REG(0x4000)).

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: SEG_MESSAGE_BUFFER_LENGTH
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Specifies the size of the scratchpad area in bytes.
Unknown. Bootcode related.
Unknown. Bootcode related.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_SEG_SIG
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set to APE_RCPU_MAGIC ('RCPU') by RX CPU.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_SEG_LENGTH
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set to 0x34.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_INIT_COUNT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Incremented by RX CPU every boot.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_FW_VERSION
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set to the bootcode version. e.g. 0x0127 -> v1.39.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_CFG_FEATURE
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set to

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_PCI_VENDOR_DEVICE_ID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set to PCI Vendor/Device ID by S2.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_PCI_SUBSYSTEM_ID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set to PCI Subsystem Vendor/Subsystem ID by S2.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_APE_RESET_COUNT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Unknown. Incremented by frobnicating routine.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_LAST_APE_STATUS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Unknown. Written by frobnicating routine.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_LAST_APE_FW_STATUS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Unknown.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_CFG_HW
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set from

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_CFG_HW_2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set from

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RCPU_CPMU_STATUS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set from

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: HOST_SEG_SIG
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set to APE_HOST_MAGIC ('HOST') to indicate the section is valid.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: HOST_SEG_LEN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set to 0x20.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: HOST_INIT_COUNT
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Incremented by host on every initialization.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: HOST_DRIVER_ID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Linux sets this to 0xF0MM_mm00, where M is the major version of Linux and m is the minor version.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: In milliseconds. Set to 0 to disable heartbeating.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PROT_MAGIC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This is set to APE_PROT_MAGIC ('PROT') on all functions. If it is 'PROT', the following fields (MAC0_HIGH/LOW) are valid

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PROT_MAC0_HIGH
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: High 16 bits of MAC address 0. Only valid if

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PROT_MAC0_LOW
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Low 16 bits of MAC address 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_SIG
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set to NCSI_MAGIC ('NCSI') by APE firmware. NOTE: all words in the NCSI section are available in the function 0 SHM area only.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_BUILD_TIME
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: ASCII string spanning three 32-bit words. Unused trailing bytes are set to zero.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_BUILD_DATE
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: ASCII string spanning three 32-bit words. Unused trailing bytes are set to zero.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: CHIP_ID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: The APE code copies the contents of Chip ID to this word

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Enabled
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This can be modified via NCSI SELECT PACKAGE and NCSI DESELECT PACKAGE.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: TX Passthrough
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: TX passthrough has been enabled by BMC NCSI command.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MCID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: AEN Management Controller ID, set by BMC when sending AEN ENABLE command and used when sending AENs.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_AEN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Set via NCSI ENABLE AEN.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Enable Host NC Driver Status Change AEN

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_SETTING_1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This is the "Link Settings" value from NCSI Set Link.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_SETTING_2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This is the "OEM Settings" value from NCSI Set Link.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_VLAN
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Receives VLAN mode from NCSI specification "Enable VLAN" command.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_ALT_HOST_MAC_HIGH
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains upper 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_ALT_HOST_MAC_MID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains mid 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_ALT_HOST_MAC_LOW
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains low 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC0_HIGH
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains upper 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC0_MID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains mid 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC0_LOW
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains low 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC1_HIGH
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains upper 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC1_MID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains mid 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC1_LOW
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains low 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC2_HIGH
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains upper 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC2_MID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains mid 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC2_LOW
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains low 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC3_HIGH
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains upper 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC3_MID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains mid 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC3_LOW
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Lower 16 bits of this word contains low 16 bits of the MAC.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC0_VLAN_VALID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Nonzero indicates VLAN field is valid

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NCSI_CHANNEL0_MAC1_VLAN_VALID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Nonzero indicates VLAN field is valid

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: SERDES
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Set from MII_REG_CONTROL__AUTO_NEGOTIATION_ENABLE. Set unconditionally in SERDES case.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Autonegotiation Complete
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Set if autonegotiation is complete.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Link Speed 1000M Full Duplex Capable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Link partner 1000BASE-T full duplex capable

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Link Speed 1000M Hals Duplex Capable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Link partner 1000BASE-T half duplex capable

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PER_LOCK_REQUEST_PHY0
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: This register, and the following Per Lock Request registers work the same. The tg3 driver uses 0x0000_1000 (APELOCK_PER_REQ_DRIVER) for PHY ports (or always for function 0).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: OUI High
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bits 3:18 of organizationally unique identifier

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: OUI Low
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Bits 19:24 of organizationally unique identifier.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: Autonegotiation Advertisement
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Bits in this register indicate what capability bits are advertised to the link partner.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: Autonegotiation Link Partner Ability Base Page
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Bits in this register indicate the capabilities of the link partner.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: Autonegotiation Link Partner Ability Next Page
BroadReach LRE Access
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: WTH is this.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Unidirectional Enable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: When set, able to transmit packets when no link

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Bypass Encoder
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: bypass 4B5B encoder and decoder

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Autonegotiation Base Page Selector Field Mismatch

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: Local Remote Receiver Not OK Counter
Auxiliary Control
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Note: Shadow Register Selector: 0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Shadow Register Selector
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writes to the selected shadow register are done on a single cycle (no setup required). Reads are selected by first writing to register 18h, shadow 7, bits 14:12.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: 10Base-T
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Note: Shadow Register Selector: 1

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Shadow Register Selector
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writes to the selected shadow register are done on a single cycle (no setup required). Reads are selected by first writing to register 18h, shadow 7, bits 14:12.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: Power and MII Control
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Note: Shadow Register Selector: 2

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Shadow Register Selector
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writes to the selected shadow register are done on a single cycle (no setup required). Reads are selected by first writing to register 18h, shadow 7, bits 14:12.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: Misc Test 1
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Note: Shadow Register Selector: 4

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Shadow Register Selector
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writes to the selected shadow register are done on a single cycle (no setup required). Reads are selected by first writing to register 18h, shadow 7, bits 14:12.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: Misc Test 2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Note: Shadow Register Selector: 5

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Shadow Register Selector
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writes to the selected shadow register are done on a single cycle (no setup required). Reads are selected by first writing to register 18h, shadow 7, bits 14:12.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: Miscellaneous Control
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Note: Shadow Register Selector: 7

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Shadow Register Selector
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writes to the selected shadow register are done on a single cycle (no setup required). Reads are selected by first writing to register 18h, shadow 7, bits 14:12.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Write Enable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enables writes to bits [8:3]

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: Cabletron LED
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Note: Shadow Register Selector: 0

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Shadow Register Selector
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writes to the selected shadow register are done by first setting up the register. Reads can be done immediately after selecting the shadow register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Write Enable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write bits [9:0]

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: DLL Selection
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Note: Shadow Register Selector: 1

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Shadow Register Selector
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writes to the selected shadow register are done by first setting up the register. Reads can be done immediately after selecting the shadow register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Write Enable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write bits [9:0]

ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writes to the selected shadow register are done by first setting up the register. Reads can be done immediately after selecting the shadow register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Write Enable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write bits [9:0]

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: Clock Alignment Control
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Note: Shadow Register Selector: 3

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Shadow Register Selector
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writes to the selected shadow register are done by first setting up the register. Reads can be done immediately after selecting the shadow register.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: Spare Control 2
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Note: Shadow Register Selector: 4

ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Writes to the selected shadow register are done by first setting up the register. Reads can be done immediately after selecting the shadow register.

ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Pages in the specified register block.
